text: kitane hee nabee aise guzare hai jinake saath hokar bahut-se eeshabhakton ne yuddh kiya, to allaah ke maarg mein jo museebat unhen pahunchee usase ve na to hataash hue aur na unhonne kamazoree dikhaee aur na aisa hua ki ve dabe ho. aur allaah drdhataapoorvak jame rahanevaalon se prem karata hai
